PrimarySkill.Description: Twin flame blades spin around you for FIRESAW_DUR seconds, dealing [u]FIRESAW_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage and applies stacks of [color=#fd9628]Burning[/color].
PrimarySkill.Summary: Unleash two spinning flame blades that deal [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage and apply [color=#fd9628]Burning[/color] stacks.

SecondarySkill.Description: Summon a fire fairy that automatically tracks enemies, dealing [u]FIREFAIRY_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire damage[/color]. At the end of its duration, it detonates and deals [u]FIREFAIRY_EX_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage. Recast the skill to teleport the fairy to your location.
SecondarySkill.Description2: Enemies hit are marked with [color=#F0E68C]Sulphuric Sigil[/color], and the fairy starts with MAX_JOINT_ATTACK_POINTS Joint Attack points.
SecondarySkill.Description3: Doing a [insert attack type here] to an enemy marked with [color=#F0E68C]Sulphuric Sigil[/color] causes the fairy to perform a [color=#ffd703]Joint Attack[/color] to that enemy, dealing [u]FIREFAIRY_JOINT_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage.
SecondarySkill.Summary: Summon a fire fairy that attacks enemies. Can perform special Joint Attacks, and be recast to teleport it to your location. Detonates at the end of its duration.

TertiarySkill.Description: Shoot a flaming orb that travels forward in a straight line, dealing [u]FIREBALL_ATK% ATK[/u] as [color=#fd9628]Fire[/color] damage. You can hold up to FIREBALL_CHARGES charges.
